field.name: summary
field.value: Stack Overflow When Resolving Decorated Service From Child Container

field.name: description
field.value:
I'm trying out the latest Windsor changes on trunk (revision 5967) and have run into a problem resolving decorated components from a child container.
I'll attach a test case for this where I see the following results: ShouldResolveDecoratedComponent => pass ShouldResolveComponentFromParent => pass ShouldResolveDecoratedComponentFromParent => stack overflow
Maybe I'm doing something goofy but this has worked in the past.

comment.author: neilb14
comment.text: Looks like the check for CanResolve in the ParentHandlerWithChildResolver isn't checking if the parentHandler exists within the CreationContext handler stack. I should be able to submit a patch shortly.

comment.author: neilb14
comment.text: I've added a patch that does the trick.

comment.author: xtoff
comment.text:
I did check this issue and patch provided some time ago. I didn't commit it though, because it changes the public interface of IHandler, and I'm not sure I like that.
If someone has an idea for alternative implementation that does not require public API changes, it would be preferred.
